statement.p: In the model \displaystyle{A}={169.2}{e}^{{{0.0268}{t}}} what is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements.

solution.p: The percent increase/decrease is calculated from \displaystyle{e}^{{0.0268}}\approx{1.0271623497489}. Because this is bigger than 1, this is a percent increase and the result is \displaystyle{1.0271623497489}-{1}={0.027162349748923}\approx{0.0272} and the percent is 2.72.
We round to 3 significant digits because the measurement (exponent) had 3 significant digits.
